info.title: Automate: Reports service
info.description: This is an OpenAPI schema definition for Adjust Automate

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of dimensions

schema.title: Dimensions
schema.description: Comma-separated list of dimensions

parameters.name: dimensions

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of metrics

schema.title: Metrics

parameters.description:
UTC offset for timezones. [+-]HH:MM format
https://help.adjust.com/en/article/overview-metrics-endpoints#parameters-1

schema.title: Utc Offset
schema.description:
UTC offset for timezones. [+-]HH:MM format
https://help.adjust.com/en/article/overview-metrics-endpoints#parameters-1

parameters.name: utc_offset

parameters.description:
Start and end dates for the report, 3 supported formats:
Logical dates: yesterday
Absolute dates: 2020-01-31:2021-01-01
Relative dates: -10d:-3d

schema.title: Date Period
schema.description:
Start and end dates for the report, 3 supported formats:
Logical dates: yesterday
Absolute dates: 2020-01-31:2021-01-01
Relative dates: -10d:-3d

parameters.name: assisting_attribution_type

parameters.description: Determines whether in-app activity is assigned to the user’s install source (first) or divided among the install source and subsequent sources of reattribution (dynamic)

parameters.name: ad_revenue_sources

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of os names.

schema.description: Comma-separated list of os names.

parameters.name: os_names

parameters.description:
Comma-separated list of values to filter dimension's values (exact match)
Any dimension, for example: campaign__in=abc,def

Any dimension, for example: campaign__contains=ios

parameters.description:
Substring search if dimension's values start with specific prefix (case insensitive)
Any dimension, for example: campaign__starts_with=ios
